servicesPage.textServicesMain: Norskness builds digital products and services for the world’s innovative companies so they can meet the digital demands of their customers, employees and businesses.

companyPage.subtitleCompanyMain: We are a digital transformation consultancy and technology engineering company that delivers cutting edge solutions for innovation organisations and technology startups.
companyPage.descriptionMission: Our mission is to help enterprises accelerate adoption of new technologies, solve complex issues that always emerge during digital evolution, and orchestrate ongoing trended solutions. Whether it is a client-oriented app or a transformative enterprise-class case, our expertice lead the process from initiation and concept to delivery, and provides ongoing maintense and support.
